info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:

;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.telerc.travail.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59777
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.telerc.travail.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
travail.gouv.fr.	1800	IN	SOA	a.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr. dnsmaster.sante.gouv.fr. 2024091302 14400 3600 3000000 3600

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.telerc.travail.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 Found
Connection: close
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Location: https://www.telerc2.travail.gouv.fr/api/antivirus/error
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Length: 0
